room_title: Escape room "Nightmare at The Museum" by Room to Escape in Fort Wayne
review: My parents (retired) & I played the museum today while I was home for a visit from Los Angeles and had a fun time. It's a creative, logical game that uses mostly standard style locks and some searching. The story is well thought out.  The decor is good. The staff is wonderful! They have amazing customer service.I've played many rooms nationwide and this is a solid, fun game. I've played one other company in Fort Wayne and I'd definitely recommend Room to Escape over the other company...hands down!

room_title: Escape room "Nightmare at The Museum" by Room to Escape in Fort Wayne
review: Room to Escape in Fort Wayne was a blast. The friendly staff made the experience a fun filled memory! The museum escape room at Room to Escape was challenging but fun all at the same time! Definitely the place to go on the weekends!

room_title: Escape room "Nightmare at The Museum" by Room to Escape in Fort Wayne
review: The best escape room in Fort Wayne. Room to Escape has it all! This escape room in Fort Wayne went above and beyond our expectations.  The rooms were clean and the puzzles and challenges were fun and creative.  We are still talking about our experience!
